mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOSINSA_PRODUCT (CATEGORY,PROIMG,PRONUM,PRONAME,BRAND,STOCK,PRICE,DETAIL,REGDATE,UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{category},#{proimg}, #{pronum}, #{proname}, #{brand}, #{stock}, #{price}, #{detail}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PRONUM) FROM HOSINSA_PRODUCT WHERE PRONUM=#{pronum}

SELECT ID, PW, NAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, PHONE, NICKNAME, PROFILIMG, GRADE, INTRODUCER, POINT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, ID, PW, NAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, PHONE, NICKNAME, PROFILIMG, GRADE, INTRODUCER, POINT FROM HOSINSA_MEMBER WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

SELECT ID, PW, NAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, PHONE, NICKNAME, PROFILIMG, GRADE, INTRODUCER, POINT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, ID, PW, NAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, PHONE, NICKNAME, PROFILIMG, GRADE, INTRODUCER, POINT FROM (SELECT * FROM HOSINSA_MEMBER WHERE (LOWER(ID) LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR LOWER(NICKNAME) LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR LOWER(NAME) LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSINSA_MEMBER WHERE ( LOWER(ID) LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR LOWER(NICKNAME) LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR LOWER(NAME) LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
SELECT * FROM HOSINSA_ORDER ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC
